## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pytest tests/ -v`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`ruff check .`)
- [ ] Format is correct (`ruff format .`)
- [ ] Terraform validates (`terraform validate` in infra/, if changed)
